project.name: Analog Sensor with Arduino and Java Example
project.description: A Java Activity that reads from an analog sensor on an Arduino board with serial communication and sends the value on a route.

property.name: space.hardware.serial.port
property.description: The serial port the Arduino is attached to. In Linux it will have a value like /dev/ttyUSB0. This is usually added in the Live Activity configuration in the Master Web Admin.
